Name: Dawn at my Neighbourhood
About the game: Save your neighbors and find out what's behind a zombie invasion and cinematic hauntings! Dawn at my Neighborhood is a tribute to classic 90s games, reworked with new mechanics and graphics inspired by N64 and PlayStation. Come with us on this amazing adventure that involves gameplay and strategy in the genres of RPG, action, metroidvania, horror and comedy! Help us bring this game to life!!! /o/ We developed this Early Access version to demonstrate + - the idea we had in mind, but of course we imagined something far beyond what you'll see here! Labyrinths, hauntings, giant bosses, reference to a thousand and one horror films!! Trust me, we intend to give you a historic game that brings a perfect mix between RPG and Metroidvania with a nice touch of action and adventure!! Check out our amazing gifts that include miniatures and figures of the characters! Designed For Solo and Couch Co-op This game can be played solo or with a friend in couch co-op mode. Help each other out of difficult situations, fighting side by side. Features Single Player & Couch Co-op Mode Explore a handcrafted 3d World Battle Against Ferocious BOSSES Equip Different Types Of Weapons and Items Discover various secret areas Use your skills and reflexes to survive Keyboard & controller support
